额，那怎么开服
用文本编辑器打开bat文件；
然后把内容贴上来；
有颜色的是必须的；
蓝色是你的核心文件名；
紫色是你的java路径；
根据你提供的信息，你的bat文件java路径没有问题；
@echo OFF
:restart
echo run server now ,  you can't close
SET BINDIR=%~dp0
"C:\Program Files\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" -Xms16m -Xmx1g -jar "%BINDIR%craftbukkit-1.7.2-R0.3-20140211.200058-44.jar"
echo stop  %DATE% %time%>>opentime.txt
echo Restart after 5 seconds , you can close now
ping -n 2 -w 500 0.0.0.1>nul
echo Restart after 4 seconds , you can close now
ping -n 2 -w 500 0.0.0.1>nul
echo Restart after 3 seconds , you can close now
ping -n 2 -w 500 0.0.0.1>nul
echo Restart after 2 seconds , you can close now
ping -n 2 -w 500 0.0.0.1>nul
echo Restart after 1 seconds , you can close now
ping -n 2 -w 500 0.0.0.1>nul
goto restart
PAUSE
